clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For use as a lubricant to prevent further irritation or to relieve dryness of the eye s L2828

contraindications.disease: The oral acute toxicity of PVOH LD50 in rats and mice are 20 g kg and 14 7 g kg respectively L2827 Adverse effects include eye pain and changes of vision and redness or irritation of the eye L2832 Mild stinging or irritation of the eye crusting of eyelid eye pain ocular hyperaemia eye pruritus foreign body sensation eye discharge and increased lacrimation may also occur L2830
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Temporarily relieves burning and irritation due to dryness of the eye or from exposure to wind or sun Lubricates the eyes and helps protect against further eye irritation dryness L2829
